title: Grasping Vine
content:
Grasping Vine Level 4 Conjuration Spell Summon a giant vine capable of dragging creatures toward itself. 9m Concentration Bonus Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Level 4 Conjuration Spell

Summon a giant vine capable of dragging creatures toward itself.

9m Concentration

Grasping Vine is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Grasping Vine is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
